quick read
- Our COVID-19 Self Determination study is published (https://www.pnas.org/doi/full/10.1073/pnas.2111091119) at PNAS.

- Our COVID-19 Message Framing study has been accepted for publication at Affective Science.
- Our Semantic Priming Study has been accepted in-principle at Nature Human Behaviour.

- We are still accepting submissions for our funded call for studies (https://psysciacc.org/news/2022-04-20_special-call-for-studies-studying-generalizability-with-global-samples.html) that meet John Templeton Foundation funding strategies.


special call for studies

We are soliciting study proposals that test the generalizability of phenomena related to John Templeton Foundation (JTF) strategic priorities, including: the dynamics of religious change, intellectual humility, religious cognition, and/or the science of character virtue, health, religion, and spirituality.

Each accepted study will:
* Be supported with $40,000 of direct funding for data collection.
* Receive additional support from 3 full time and 2 part time research staff.
* Be advertised to prospective collaborators (e.g., data collection sites) in the PSA network.

For more information, see the full call for studies (https://psysciacc.org/news/2022-04-20_special-call-for-studies-studying-generalizability-with-global-samples.html) .
